resourceType.description:
Resources are entities that can be managed and accessed through the
Access API.

resourceId.description: The resource ID to scope the access request to. Must be a valid ID for the resource type.

includeChildren.description: Whether to include children resources in the response. Only applies to `organization` resources.

nextCursor.description: The cursor for pagination. Use the nextCursor from the previous response to get the next page.

limit.description: The number of items to return per page.
